long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🔍 Overview:
Webhook Manager is a Chrome extension designed to simplify the integration and management of webhooks directly from your browser. This tool enables users to send data to webhooks through context menus accessible on web pages, links, and images. With a user-friendly interface and robust functionality, Webhook Manager boosts productivity and facilitates seamless data communication.

🌟 Key Features:
✅ Easy Webhook Registration: Quickly register and configure new webhooks by entering the Webhook URL and a friendly name.
✅ Context Menu Integration: Send URLs or data to any registered webhook via right-click context menus, supported on pages, links, or images.
✅ Dynamic Management: Manage your webhooks effortlessly through the extension popup, where you can view, modify, or delete them.
✅ Secure and Private: Ensures all data handled by the extension remains private and secure, with no external server data storage.

🛠 Technical Specifications:
🔑 Permissions: Requires minimal permissions such as storage and active tab to perform efficiently without compromising security.
🔄 Efficient Background Processes: Utilizes background scripts to dynamically update and manage webhook configurations.
🚨 Error Handling: Robust error handling mechanisms alert users of any issues during the webhook creation or triggering processes.

📋 How It Works:
Install the extension and use the popup form to add a new webhook. Right-click on any page, link, or image, and choose the appropriate webhook from the context menu to send the data. Easily edit or delete webhooks through the popup interface.

🌐 Compatibility: Works with all websites and supports Chrome browsers with Manifest V3 compliance.

🚀 Get Webhook Manager today and streamline your data handling with ease!
